Title: Intelligent English Automatic Translation System Based on Human-Computer Interaction Enhancement Algorithm
Abstract: english is the most widely used language in the world. the popularity of the internet has made people‚äôs demand for english translation more and more large. the problem of language communication barriers is gradually highlighted. manual translation needs huge human and financial support. the technology has provided excellent hardware support for intelligent automatic translation. therefore this paper focuses on the research and design of translation system based on human computer interaction enhancement algorithm. this paper first describes the characteristics of the intelligent english automatic translation system and the language model the system and designs the system architecture and human computer interaction interface. finally it analyzes the performance and the results of long sentence translation. the research results show that the intelligent english automatic translation system based on the human computer interaction enhancement algorithm has better performance than the traditional machine translation system.
